events.message: We have received Emily Johnson's application for the software engineer position. Her resume shows strong skills in Java and cloud technologies, which match our requirements well.
Emily's application has been categorized under Engineering because she has relevant experience in software development and DevOps practices.
Recruiter Michael Davis has been assigned to manage Emily Johnson's recruitment process and will coordinate upcoming interviews.
Initial phone screening completed with Emily; she demonstrated excellent communication skills and a clear understanding of software engineering principles.
Emily responded promptly confirming her availability for the technical interview next week and expressed enthusiasm about the opportunity.
A technical interview with the engineering team has been scheduled for Emily on 2024-05-10 at 10:00 AM UTC via video call.
